title: If a bunch of champs went to the same gym
body:
I had this idea the other day that "what if the League champs had a gym they trained in when not being summoned? what would it look like?" sort of the pool party scenario. I can't draw, but I did think of a few things each champ might be doing at the gym.

{{champion:92}} in a deadlifting contest with {{champion:122}}. Two {{champion:7}} clones sit on each one of Darius's weights, each one looking at Riven with infatuation. Darius is visibly trying extremely hard, as it's a lot of weight. Riven is deadlifting with only her sword arm, looking bored. She has both {{champion:69}} and {{champion:55}} on each weight. Cass is looking at her nails, while Kat is sharpening her blades and looking at {{champion:86}}, who's doing his signature "holding the world up" exercise with {{champion:99}}. Both Garen and Lux are giggling at Darius.

{{champion:254}} 's gloves are on the ground, and made cracks where she dropped them next to her armor. {{champion:113}}'s armor and flail are nearby, and the two are engaged in a "friendly" boxing match. {{champion:127}}  and {{champion:51}} look on, though it looks like only Caitlyn is the only one cheering...

{{champion:33}} is struggling to reach the bar to do a pull-up.

{{champion:120}} is training on four treadmills at once. {{champion:15}} is on the treadmill next to him, intimidated.

{{champion:126}} and {{champion:68}} are more concerned with "upgrading" the gym equipment than actually working out.

{{champion:12}} and {{champion:36}} are having a flex-off. 

{{champion:105}} is waiting his turn for {{champion:59}} to finish pole-vaulting.

{{champion:89}} is spotting for {{champion:80}}.

{{champion:131}}'s on the bench, taking a drink. She's just finished her set. No one ever spots for her.

{{champion:67}} and {{champion:133}} are stretching to do some gymnastics.

{{champion:102}} is angrily hitting a punching bag. {{champion:58}} holds it, looking almost like he can't hold it back.

{{champion:43}} is doing tai chi.

{{champion:134}} is shooting some hoops.

{{champion:114}} is showing {{champion:11}} some improvements to his stance. Of course, Master yi knows these already, but Fiora's awfully close to him... he's blushing.

{{champion:77}} and {{champion:2}} are arm-wrestling. {{champion:106}} and {{champion:48}} are arguing who gets to face winner.

{{champion:10}} is trying to jump rope, but keeps getting caught in he wings. {{champion:103}} is next to her, making it look easy with her tails of hers.

{{champion:60}} is faaaaarrrr off in the corner, making a cobweb. {{champion:121}} is hiding behind a trash can, too nervous to talk to her.

{{champion:143}} sits right under the window for some sun. Wait, is she sleeping? {{champion:57}} is trying to figure that out.

{{champion:119}} and {{champion:21}} are too busy checking themselves out in the mirror to be working out... {{champion:154}}'s giving them a thumb's up.

{{champion:14}}'s arm fell off while trying to lift. {{champion:85}}'s laughing at him, while {{champion:6}} helps him out.

{{champion:150}}'s his rage almost full, is trying really hard to deadlift a tiny weight. {{champion:201}}  and a {{summoner:31}} are encouraging him. Is that a mustache growing on Gnar's face? 

{{champion:39}} is balancing on a Nerf (tm) bat. 

{{champion:27}} is taking a big gulp of... something. Looks like he just got off the treadmill.

{{champion:62}} looks like he's doing pullups with his tail... wait, no, that's his clone. The real one is relaxing on a cloud.

{{champion:266}}, {{champion:110}}, and {{champion:157}} are comparing their abs, though Yasuo seems a bit distracted by Riven...

{{champion:18}}'s doing her best jumping jacks next to {{champion:236}} Lucian's impressed with how high she can jump.

{{champion:82}} accidentally got a bunch of weights stuck to him. Stupid magnetism. {{champion:54}}'s trying to help him out.

{{champion:111}} is trying to swim (in the air), but it seems he's being pulled backward by some sort of magnet...

{{champion:23}}'s doing pushups with {{champion:22}} on his back. Ashe is eating an apple. They're both blushing.

{{champion:75}} is showing {{champion:19}}  that you can never skip leg day. {{champion:56}} looks down, sad.

{{champion:107}} and {{champion:76}} are both trying to catch {{champion:29}}, but have to hold their noses.

{{champion:238}} and {{champion:98}} are... playing rock paper scissors? 

{{champion:84}} and {{champion:64}} are kicking the bags.

{{champion:5}} and {{champion:78}} are working out back to back on the machines.

{{champion:421}} is leading her babies in... a digging exercise?

{{champion:83}}'s the janitor. He's not too happy about it.


Got any ideas about what your favorite champions might be doing at the gym?
